original_text: The adhesion/cohesion of the coating was evaluated by the scratch test method, using a Revetest system (CSM Instruments SA, Switzerland) equipped with a H-270 diamond indentor (200μm diameter). Six scratch indentations were carried out under previously optimized conditions (linear progressive load mode 1–4N, 4Nmin−1). In order to aid in determination of location of spallation/delamination, an extended scratch length of 6mm was employed. The scratch tracks were subsequently observed by SEM to determine the locations of the first coating failure and to understand the nature of the coating failure. During the scratch tests, the loading force and penetration depth were recorded and their respective values were correlated with the observed failure locations. The surface roughness of the coating was evaluated using a surface roughness tester (TR200, Timegroup Inc.) according to ISO standard [29]. Due to the presence of the open porosity in the outer layer of the coating, a measurement length for determination of the roughness (Ra) of 0.8mm was used. In total, eight measurements were carried out in different directions.
original_translation: La adherencia/cohesión del recubrimiento fue evaluada mediante el método de prueba de rayado, utilizando un sistema Revetest (CSM Instruments SA, Suiza) equipado con un indentador de diamante H-270 (diámetro de 200 μm). Se realizaron seis indentaciones de arañazo bajo condiciones previamente optimizadas (modo de carga lineal progresiva 1–4N, 4Nmin−1). Para ayudar en la determinación de la ubicación de la espoladura/delaminación, se empleó una longitud de rayado extendida de 6 mm. Las pistas de arañazos fueron posteriormente observadas por SEM para determinar las ubicaciones de la primera falla en el recubrimiento y comprender la naturaleza de la falla en el recubrimiento. Durante las pruebas de rayado, se registraron la fuerza de carga y la profundidad de penetración, y sus valores respectivos se correlacionaron con las ubicaciones de falla observadas. La rugosidad de la superficie del recubrimiento fue evaluada utilizando un medidor de rugosidad de superficie (TR200, Timegroup Inc.) de acuerdo con la norma ISO [29]. Debido a la presencia de la porosidad abierta en la capa externa del recubrimiento, se utilizó una longitud de medición de 0.8mm para la determinación de la rugosidad (Ra). En total, se realizaron ocho mediciones en diferentes direcciones.
original_sentences: The adhesion/cohesion of the coating was evaluated by the scratch test method, using a Revetest system (CSM Instruments SA, Switzerland) equipped with a H-270 diamond indentor (200μm diameter).
Six scratch indentations were carried out under previously optimized conditions (linear progressive load mode 1–4N, 4Nmin−1).
In order to aid in determination of location of spallation/delamination, an extended scratch length of 6mm was employed.
The scratch tracks were subsequently observed by SEM to determine the locations of the first coating failure and to understand the nature of the coating failure.
During the scratch tests, the loading force and penetration depth were recorded and their respective values were correlated with the observed failure locations.
The surface roughness of the coating was evaluated using a surface roughness tester (TR200, Timegroup Inc.) according to ISO standard [29].
Due to the presence of the open porosity in the outer layer of the coating, a measurement length for determination of the roughness (Ra) of 0.8mm was used.
In total, eight measurements were carried out in different directions.

original_annotated_sentences:
The
adhesion/cohesion
of the coating was evaluated by the scratch test method, using a Revetest system (CSM Instruments SA, Switzerland) equipped with a H-270 diamond indentor (200μm diameter).
Six scratch indentations were carried out under previously optimized conditions (linear progressive load mode 1–4N, 4Nmin−1).
In order to aid in determination of location of spallation/delamination, an extended scratch length of 6mm was employed.
The scratch tracks were subsequently observed by SEM to determine the locations of the first coating failure and to understand the nature of the coating failure.
During the scratch tests, the loading force and penetration depth were recorded and their respective values were correlated with the observed failure locations.
The surface roughness of the coating was evaluated using a surface roughness tester (TR200, Timegroup Inc.) according to ISO standard [29].
Due to the presence of the open porosity in the outer layer of the coating, a measurement length for determination of the roughness (Ra) of 0.8mm was used.
In total, eight measurements were carried out in different directions.
original_annotated_samples:
The
adhesion/cohesion
of the coating was evaluated by the scratch test method, using a Revetest system (CSM Instruments SA, Switzerland) equipped with a H-270 diamond indentor (200μm diameter).
translated_annotated_samples:
Output: La
adhesión/cohesión
del recubrimiento fue evaluada mediante el método de prueba de rayado, utilizando un sistema Revetest (CSM Instruments SA, Suiza) equipado con un indentador de diamante H-270 (diámetro de 200μm).
adhesion/cohesion.translated_text:
Output: La
adhesión/cohesión
del recubrimiento fue evaluada mediante el método de prueba de rayado, utilizando un sistema Revetest (CSM Instruments SA, Suiza) equipado con un indentador de diamante H-270 (diámetro de 200μm). Se realizaron seis indentaciones de arañazo bajo condiciones previamente optimizadas (modo de carga lineal progresiva 1–4N, 4Nmin−1). Para ayudar en la determinación de la ubicación de la espoladura/delaminación, se empleó una longitud de rayado extendida de 6 mm. Las pistas de arañazos fueron posteriormente observadas por SEM para determinar las ubicaciones de la primera falla en el recubrimiento y comprender la naturaleza de la falla en el recubrimiento. Durante las pruebas de rayado, se registraron la fuerza de carga y la profundidad de penetración, y sus valores respectivos se correlacionaron con las ubicaciones de falla observadas. La rugosidad de la superficie del recubrimiento fue evaluada utilizando un medidor de rugosidad de superficie (TR200, Timegroup Inc.) de acuerdo con la norma ISO [29]. Debido a la presencia de la porosidad abierta en la capa externa del recubrimiento, se utilizó una longitud de medición de 0.8mm para la determinación de la rugosidad (Ra). En total, se realizaron ocho mediciones en diferentes direcciones.

Se realizaron seis indentaciones de arañazo bajo condiciones previamente optimizadas (modo de carga lineal progresiva 1–4N, 4Nmin−1). Para ayudar en la determinación de la ubicación de la espoladura/delaminación, se empleó una longitud de rayado extendida de 6 mm. Las pistas de arañazos fueron posteriormente observadas por SEM para determinar las ubicaciones de la primera falla en el recubrimiento y comprender la naturaleza de la falla en el recubrimiento. Durante las pruebas de rayado, se registraron la fuerza de carga y la profundidad de penetración, y sus valores respectivos se correlacionaron con las ubicaciones de falla observadas. La rugosidad de la superficie del recubrimiento fue evaluada utilizando un medidor de rugosidad de superficie (TR200, Timegroup Inc.) de acuerdo con la norma ISO [29]. Output: Debido a la presencia de la porosidad abierta en la capa externa del recubrimiento, se utilizó una longitud de medición para la determinación de la rugosidad (
Ra
) de 0.8mm. En total, se realizaron ocho mediciones en diferentes direcciones.

Revetest system (CSM Instruments SA, Swi.translated_key: Revetest (CSM Instruments SA, Suiza) equipado con un indentador de diamante H-270 (diámetro de 200μm)
original_annotated_sentences:
The adhesion/cohesion of the coating was evaluated by the scratch test method, using a
Revetest system (CSM Instruments SA, Switzerland) equipped with a H-270 diamond indentor (200μm diameter)
.
Six scratch indentations were carried out under previously optimized conditions (linear progressive load mode 1–4N, 4Nmin−1).
In order to aid in determination of location of spallation/delamination, an extended scratch length of 6mm was employed.
The scratch tracks were subsequently observed by SEM to determine the locations of the first coating failure and to understand the nature of the coating failure.
During the scratch tests, the loading force and penetration depth were recorded and their respective values were correlated with the observed failure locations.
The surface roughness of the coating was evaluated using a surface roughness tester (TR200, Timegroup Inc.) according to ISO standard [29].
Due to the presence of the open porosity in the outer layer of the coating, a measurement length for determination of the roughness (Ra) of 0.8mm was used.
In total, eight measurements were carried out in different directions.

The adhesion/cohesion of the coating was evaluated by the scratch test method, using a
Revetest system (CSM Instruments SA, Switzerland) equipped with a H-270 diamond indentor (200μm diameter)
.

Revetest (CSM Instruments SA, Suiza) equipado con un indentador de diamante H-270 (diámetro de 200μm)
.
